measure.name: aedg_k_12_exterior_wall_construction
measure.description: This measure will modify existing exterior wall insulation levels based on construction type and climate zone. The exterior wall construction type and climate zone should be set in the model prior to using this measure. For mass and metal walls if an existing insulation layer can be found it will be increased, if not a new insulation layer will be added. For mass this will be at the exterior of the construction. For metal it will be added just behind the exterior layer. For steel and wood framed walls, insulation will be added to the exterior of the construction.
measure.modeler_description: Relevant construction types: - Mass - Steel framed - Wood framed - Metal building - Attic surfaces should have an Attic intended use type

argument.name: material_cost_insulation_increase_ip
argument.display_name: Increase Cost per Area of Construction Where Insulation was Improved ($/ft^2).
